# zm - Zig Math library
Moved to [Codeberg](https://codeberg.org/grius/zm). Not mirrored.

releases.body:
## What's Changed
* Add Mat4.scalingVec3 by @TotoShampoin in https://github.com/griush/zm/pull/20
* Add Quaternion.fromMatrix by @TotoShampoin in https://github.com/griush/zm/pull/21
* update to zig 0.15.1 by @fathonyfath in https://github.com/griush/zm/pull/22

## New Contributors
* @TotoShampoin made their first contribution in https://github.com/griush/zm/pull/20
* @fathonyfath made their first contribution in https://github.com/griush/zm/pull/22

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/griush/zm/compare/0.3.0...0.4.0

## What's Changed
* feat: implement back simd for vec by @griush in https://github.com/griush/zm/pull/7
* feat: implement AABBs by @griush in https://github.com/griush/zm/pull/10
* performance by @griush in https://github.com/griush/zm/pull/11


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/griush/zm/compare/0.2.0...0.3.0

## What's Changed
* Performance improvements
* New functions helpful for ML and animations
* Code quality improvements


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/griush/zm/compare/0.1.0...0.2.0

## 0.1.0 Release
Initial release for [zm](https://github.com/griush/zm/). Includes vectors, matrices, quaternions and other useful functions for game programming.

## Contributors
* @griush

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/griush/zm/commits/0.1.0
